mean_en: an official document that is given by a company, showing it has borrowed money from a person and stating the interest payments that it will make to them
sentence: The fixed interest rate of the debenture differs according to the recipient's credit rating.
sentence_trans: 根据公司的信用评级，信用债券的利率也不相同。
word_etyma: deben欠债 ＋ ture表名词 → debenture信用债券，退税证明书
